basics.label: Administrative Coordinator
basics.summary: Reliable and energetic arts administrator with a Master of Arts in Arts Management. A highly motivated individual with strong organizational and prioritization abilities. Areas of expertise include communications, public relations, marketing, event planning and outreach.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed and implemented new scheduling system for special events, portfolio reviews and advising. Manage front line communication between students, faculty and administration, prepares written communication for prospective and current student admittance.
highlights: Assist with PR/Marketing with CVPA Academic Affairs and Admissions Offices
Serve as liaison for marketing School of Art Portfolio Review Day and Open House events
Processing curricular paperwork, preparing syllabus for Web publication

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Manage Center for the Arts internal production calendar. Provide continuous data maintenance/entry in R-25 scheduling system. Rental recaps - track labor hours for FT staff and over-hire. Coordinate hiring ushers and stage hands for events. Union payroll.
highlights: Assist Production Manager in performance logistics

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Identified and conducted market research to provide logistical marketing support to the Artistic Director. Assisted with developing creative summer camps and workshops.
highlights: Gathered promotional material for summer classes
Provide PR and marketing support for Artistic Director

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Event management for Friends of the Hylton. Provided staff support for annual fundraising event "Shooting for the Stars". Responsible for logistics of Friends of the Hylton Center.
highlights: Attend Friends of Hylton Center committee meetings
Assemble donor kits and presentation materials for events
Process donations and prepare acknowledgment letters and other correspondence
Logistics of donor and volunteer cultivation

education.institution: George Mason University, College of Visual and Performing Arts
New Mexico State University, College of Human Performance

skills.name: Administrative Skills
keywords: Working knowledge of WordPress and Photoshop
Experience with Banner, Patriot Web, 25Live and eVA Purchasing systems
Familiarity with Microsoft Office and social media
Experience with Banner, Patriot Web, 25Live and eVA Purchasing systems
